name: Za Warudo
description:
This is a small game prototype inspired by JoJo's  Bizarre Adventure where you play as Dio's Za Warudo stand and destroy bots.

This prototype offers some of Dio's abilities such as Za Warudo time stopping, Road Roller Daaaa, and laser eyes.

Controls:

  • Move: WASD / Arows
  • Laser eye shooting / Muda Muda: Left mouse button
  • Road roller: Right mouse button
  • Za Warudo: E
  • Dash: Left Shift

disclaimer: I do not own the audio used in this game, All rights reserved to the respective copyright owners.
